other_tests.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions, right greater than left; decreased intrinsic T1 hyperintense signal diffusely within the pancreatic parenchyma with surrounding fluid signal and stranding; T2 hyperintense nonenhancing foci throughout the pancreatic parenchyma are unchanged in location and number compared to the prior MRCP, but some are slightly increased in size; splenomegaly measuring 14.6 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The largest pseudocyst in the head of the pancreas increased in size from 15 x 11 mm to 16 x 15 mm; a smaller lesion in the head/uncinate process increased from 6 x 5 mm to 11 x 7 mm.
